reviews.review:
I have a love hate relationship with this game. You should play both sides (killer / survivor) in order to really understand my perspective.

[b] Pros: 
[*] Great line-up of killers (iconic killers like Myers, Demo, Nemesis etc.)
[*] Fun to play at lower ranks
[*] Great line-up of survivors (iconic ones such a Laurie fro,m Halloween, Jill Valentine etc.)
[*] Fun slasher game
[*] Feels good to experiment with Killers powers (can be a con tho ill explain in the cons)
[*] Perks in the game are equally fun to experiment (especially in different combinations) (again also can be a con)

[b] Cons:
[*] Bugs, Bugs, Bugs
[*] Lag, lag, lag
[*] Try-hards (especially at red ranks)
[*] Killers can camp the hook
[*] You can get survivors that just bang out generators and hide rather than engaging in chases (which I know is the point of the game from the survivors point of view, but it is not very fun from the killers perspective)
[*] When you get to purple ranks and above the players become toxic. 
[*] Some players have thousands of hours more than the average player and are rightfully much better, but stomp you into the ground (get gud lol)
[*] Solo play as a survivor can suck
[*] Can be stressful to play
[*] The grind for perks is REAL (I've played ~670 hrs. and am no where near to getting all of them on every killer and survivor)

There are more of both pros and cons, but that is what I came up with off the top of my head. I'd recommend the game if you like to be stressed out, and excited at the same time. It is a competitive game at first, but after a while you get used to the anxiety and can just chill and play. Overall it's a buy for me!
get hit from 11 light years away
Good chill game. Very psychological in the pvp aspect
Just no. You're better off doing something productive.
a really good game with the worst community ive ever seen
This game is very infuriating and I keep going against red ranks despite being a green rank myself, still play it all day everyday tho so 9/10

No lo recomiendo para nada. el juego esta bueno en s√≠, bien pensado. pero te obligan a ser toxico, y no es algo que me guste, pero los devs no hacen nada por frenar eso, no permabanean a los trolls, no restan puntos a los toxicos, esta lleno de bugs y malos matchmakins. En fin, espero con ansiasa que haya un juego como viernes 13 o similar a este pero que los desarrolladores presten atencion a los buenos jugadores que vienen a divertirse y pasarla bien, que para eso invertimos tanto dinero.

337 hours in, over 1000 survivors brutally murdered, I can say with full certainty this game is addicting to play and to watch. They constantly update the game and try to make it better, more fun and balanced for both sides of the game. The only two complaints I have about the game are the bugs, and the toxicity including hackers. overall this game is a solid 19 outta 20 very gucci.
amazing game needs a few fixes

- L'ambiance du jeu : Croyez moi, au d√©but si vous n'avez pas l'habitude des jeux type horreur, vous allez √™tre en panique et vous taper quelques JumpScare.. √©videment tout seul.. Mais heureusement.. ou malheureusement ??? √† la longue ce sera juste une promenade de sant√© :]

Hors jeu, DbD est largement suivi et √† une vrai communaut√© , La Hype autour du jeu depuis sa sortie est r√©el et beaucoup d'artistes en tout genres s'inspires de son univers. Sans oublier les cr√©ateurs de  contenus sur twitch ou youtube, qui participes activement √† la diffusion du jeu.

Les contres :

Et que le syst√®me de rangs pour le moment reste la meilleure option.
